name: HowToTrainYourDragon
0: ”Alexa open how to train your dragon”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how to train your dragon
Developer Terms of Use
des: Astrid and Fishlegs are the master dragon spotters and they want YOU to join them on their next journey. You chart the journey’s course and choose which islands to visit. The more unusual dragons you can spot, the more points you can earn. You can become a true Dragon Rider by the end of your trip.
